replies.author: william_2019
replies.txt_content: 目前我看是没有1.8的砍树mod但是如果你可以用命令方块的话，就把以下的指令打进去作用和砍树mod一样虽然对新加的树没有效果但是有总比没有好(过程会卡）/summon Item ~ ~+4 ~-0.1 {Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:air,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/kill @e[type=Item,r=3],Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/gamerule commandBlockOutput false,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/scoreboard objectives add log dummy,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~1 ~-2 ~-6 minecraft:bedrock 0 replace,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~3 ~0 ~-5 minecraft:redstone_block,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/setblock ~3 ~0 ~-5
